name: google-researcher-mcp
description: MCP server providing Google Search, web scraping, and multi-source research tools for AI assistants
long_description:
A comprehensive MCP server that enables AI assistants to search the web, scrape content, and conduct multi-source research.

**Features:**
- Google Custom Search with filtering options
- Web page scraping with JavaScript rendering
- YouTube transcript extraction
- Document parsing (PDF, DOCX, PPTX)
- Academic paper and patent search
- Multi-step research tracking
- Smart caching and rate limiting

google_api_key.title: Google Custom Search API Key
google_api_key.description: Get your API key from console.cloud.google.com. Enable the Custom Search JSON API.

google_search_id.title: Google Programmable Search Engine ID
google_search_id.description: Create a search engine at programmablesearchengine.google.com and copy the Search Engine ID.

tools.name: google_search
tools.description: Search the web using Google Custom Search API. Returns URLs with titles and snippets.

tools.name: scrape_page
tools.description: Extract text content from a URL. Handles web pages, YouTube videos, and documents (PDF, DOCX, PPTX).

tools.name: search_and_scrape
tools.description: Search Google AND retrieve content from top results in one call. Returns combined, deduplicated content.

tools.name: google_image_search
tools.description: Search for images using Google Custom Search API. Returns image URLs, thumbnails, and dimensions.

tools.name: google_news_search
tools.description: Search for recent news articles with freshness filters and date sorting.

tools.name: academic_search
tools.description: Search academic papers. Returns papers with citations from arXiv, PubMed, IEEE, Nature, Springer.

tools.name: patent_search
tools.description: Search patents via Google Patents. Supports prior art search, assignee filtering, and patent office selection.

tools.name: sequential_search
tools.description: Track multi-step research progress across multiple API calls for complex investigations.
